column7: Good place for a drink - but don't try the food
column9:
This bar has a lot going for it: the interior has a British pub atmosphere and there is an outside area to the front and rear. The latter has a good view of an attractive back yard of half-timbered buildings.

column7: Vegetarian dinner and great beer selection
column9: We enjoyed our home-made veggie burger/think fries (one of two vegetarian mains on the menu, and there were also several starters) and a couple of really good beers for dinner tonight. The service was very helpful and the place has a lovely feeling about it....More
Superb venue, excellent home cooking - recommend having the Bulgarian dishes, some of the best food I've ever eaten.
What a great pub! It's actually as near to an English boozer you could get but it's Swedish!  Great bar staff, made to feel welcome! Sat outside in the rear drinking. Very good.

There were so many great beer options to choose from here at Inferno. It seemed to be a great hangout for local professors and students. It can be a little crowded, but worth going to check out for a pint or two.

column7: Great service, great beer, great food - go now!

A very nice outdoor seating in the inside garden of restaurang.
Great drinks, food was decent but very comforting. Something for everyone and not expensive. Maybe not the top but a good choice for a super casual dinner.
Very cosy pub with the largest beer range and best beers of Lund. Real place for beer lovers and a cosy place to sit. Prices are higher  but worth the great beers.

column7: Cozy place in the center of Lund
column9:
Simple and nice place to take a beer in a have a meal.

Only steps north of the university and the cathedral. Great beer and cider selection. Friendly and knowledgeable bartender made the choice of beverage easy. Compared with the tourist traps at the big square, this is heaven.

column7: Fast service but the Dante Burger did not impress

column7: Food is ok and the staff is really nice and friendly !
column9: I have been there several times and I have to say that the bartender is really nice and friendly. He takes the time to answer questions about whisky or beer they have which is great!

column7: Tasty meal in rustic setting, but food lacks finesse

column7: Good burgers & a very, very, very long beer list
column9: We were simply overwhelmed by the incredible beer selection. Their Dante burger and veggie burger are great! Maybe you don't want to sit next to the very graphic "Inferno" wall painting though ... At least not while eating ;).

column7: Good place to talk, otherwise mediocre.
